description: Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi met the Chief Executive of Afghanistan, Dr Abdullah Abdullah today. Prime Minister extended a warm welcome to Dr Abdullah who would be delivering a Keynote Address at the Conference on Counter-terrorism-2016 being held in Jaipur. Dr Abdullah Abdullah recalled positi…
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
CEO Dr Abdullah Abdullah & I had a fruitful meeting on how to deepen the strategic partnership between India & Afghanistan. 

India's support to efforts of Afghan people in building a peaceful, stable, prosperous, inclusive & democratic Afghanistan is unwavering.
